directions: Stir ingredients, except soda, with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with soda and garnish with cucumber and orange slices in the glass.
ingredients: 1/2 ounce sherry (preferably Amontillado) or sweet vermouth
1/2 ounce orange curaçao (or triple sec if you like it sweeter)
title: Claret Cup
